spec_data.Name: libsigrokdecode
spec_data.Description:
libsigrokdecode is a shared library written in C which provides the basic API
for running sigrok protocol decoders. The protocol decoders themselves
are written in Python.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 04 Aug 2017 01:27:09 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Basic API for running protocol decoders
